Action.author: bstasyszyn
Action.body: If I have peers from multiple orgs (MSPs) joined to a channel and I have a CC policy that requires endorsements from multiple orgs then I'd like to know to which peers to send the proposal in order to satisfy the policy. For scalability reasons I don't want to send the proposal to all of the peers all of the time - just a minimal set that will satisfy the policy.
